Move the tab bar down along with the address bar. This utility makes it easier for users to quickly interact with tabs.

Performance improvements for Find On Page.

Fixed an issue where the app would crash when the user manipulates the address bar. This issue only appears on devices whose version is iOS 10.x

Bug fixes and other technical improvements.

Allows taking a screenshot with the displayed content. Enable it from share -> take a screenshot

Support closing other tabs when long press on tab list button

Allows creating duplicate tab when long press on new tab button, tab list button and on address bar.

Support searching the web from the menu when selecting text on the page. Helps you to search with new content in a new tab faster. You can also interact from share -> search web.

Fixed the issue where the app could not interact after playing the video in full screen mode. Occurs only on devices with iOS version 12.x

Bug fixes and technical improvements.

Happy New Year 2022.
Thank you to all of you who have supported RedApp Lite during the past time. Wishing you peace, health and all the best in the future.

This updated version includes improvements related to user experience, performance, and bug fixes.

Hope you all continue to support RedApp Lite and share it for everyone to use.

Support quick search feature, very useful when you can quickly search for the content you want without opening a new tab. Enable it when you long press on the address bar, tabs button or new tab button.

Support quick look feature to quickly preview the content of a specific link when browsing the web. Of course, you don't even need to open a new tab.

Library widget support in new tab for iPad. You can disable it in new tab's settings.

Bug fixes and performance improvements.
